content: row 1 rs k1 k2tog k to marker yo slm k1 slm ptbl p to last 2 sts k2 yo k to last 3 sts ssk k1 row 2 ws k to 1 st before maker ktbl slm k1 slm row 9-10 repeat row 5-6 ktbl k to end row 11 k1 k2tog k1 k3 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo to work row 1 and 2 a total of fifteen times 3 sts before marker k3 yo slm k1 slm yo k3 yo cut c23 sl1 k2tog psso yo k3 to last 4 sts k1 ssk k1 row 12 k2 p to 1 st before marker ptbl slm p1 slm ptbl p to last 2 sts k2 section 24 join c24 row 13-14 repeat row 5-6 row 1 rs k1 k2tog k to marker yo slm k1 slm row 15 k1 k2tog yo k2tog k3 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo k to last 3 sts ssk k1 yo to 1 st before marker k1 yo slm k1 slm yo k1 row 2 ws k to 1 st before maker ktbl slm k1 slm yo sl1 k2tog psso yo k3 to last 4 sts ssk yo ssk ktbl k to end k1 row 16 k2 p to 1 st before marker ptbl slm p1 work row 1 and 2 a total of fifteen times slm ptbl p to last 2 sts k2 row 17-18 repeat row 5-6 bind-off note you will work the bind-off on the ws row 19 k1 k2tog yo sl1 k2tog psso yo k3 to 3 of your work sts before marker k3 yo slm k1 slm yo k3 k3 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo to last 3 sts ssk k1 work i-cord bind off as follows *k2 k2tog-tbl sl3 row 20 k2 p to 1 st before marker ptbl slm p1 sts back to lhn repeat from * until 6 sts remain when slm ptbl p to last 2 sts k2 you reach the last 6 sts place 3 sts on each needle and graft together to finish tutorial on page 4 row 21-22 repeat row 5-6 row 23 k1 k2tog k1 yo sl1 k2tog psso yo k3 to finishing 2 sts before marker k2 yo slm k1 slm yo k2 k3 weave in any ends yo sl1 k2tog psso yo to last 4 sts k1 ssk k1 row 24 k2 p to 1 st before marker ptbl slm p1 slm ptbl p to last 2 sts k2 row 25-26 repeat row 5-6 row 27 k1 k2tog k to marker yo slm k1 slm yo k to last 3 sts ssk k1 row 28 k to 1 st before maker ktbl slm k1 slm thank you for creating with factory ktbl k to end girl design your hands your heart and cut c22 your story bring these stitches to life stay cozy keep creating and always wear your joy cheers & stitches crystal 10 let s shawl together www shopfactorygirl com
